{"title": "Song of Iron", "title_search": "song of iron", "title_keyword": "song of iron", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/song-of-iron/", "summary": "Behind you lies a trail of broken helms, shattered shields. You hold the axe of a fallen foe. Worn and dented, it will suit it's purpose. What lies ahead is still a mystery, your goal is not. To save your people you must find the Great Temple of the Gods, but do not expect a warm welcome.    Prepare to be met by a world set against you.
